settings.title: Does every product/gift come with a box?
settings.text:
Individual items do not come with custom packaging. You can add custom packaging to your order if you would like your gift to include a box.

If a gift set includes custom packaging, it will be noted in the product description.

settings.title: I need to make a rush order.
settings.text: We're happy to help you with your rush order! Rush orders are available for in-stock items only. You can check out our rush order items or book a meeting with us to review your needs.

settings.title: How do I create a customer account?
settings.text:
To create a customer account, click on the middle icon (looks like a person) at the top right. You can also click here to be brought to the page directly.

You will see a "Create account" option underneath the password field. Click this option and fill out the form.

Once you have created an account, you will receive an email notification confirming your account creation and can log in.

settings.title: How do I log in to my customer account?
settings.text: To log in to your customer account, click on the middle icon (looks like a person) at the top right. Enter your email address and password, and click sign in.

settings.title: How do I add a logo or initials to a product?
settings.text:
If a product has the ability to be decorated, you will see options to select blank, logo, or initials where applicable.

A team member will reach out to you after you place your order to collect any needed logos or initials.

settings.title: Can I see what the product looks like before you ship it?
settings.text:
After you place your order, a team member will reach out to confirm any personalization and will provide mockups of products for approval before processing your order.

Please note, your order will not start processing until mockups are approved.

settings.title: How long does shipping take?
settings.text: Orders typically ship 2 weeks after artwork approval. Shipping times may vary for high quantity orders.

settings.title: How much does shipping cost?
settings.text:
Shipping rates will vary based on how many boxes, gift sets, and/or items you are sending. Our standard rates are listed for your reference below.

Standard Ground:
Boxes - $17.50 each
Gift Sets - $17.50 each
Individual Items - Based on weight

Rush Shipping:
Boxes - $85 each
Gift Sets - $85 each
Individual Items - Based on weight

settings.title: How do I create a resale account?
settings.text:
To create a resale account, click on the middle icon (looks like a person) at the top right or click here to be brought to the page directly. You will see a "Create resale account" option underneath the password field. Click this option and fill out the form.

Once you have created an account, we will verify your reseller affiliation. Once approved, you will receive an email notification and can log in by clicking the same middle icon.

settings.title: How do I see preferred pricing?
settings.text:
You will be able to see preferred pricing on products after signing in to your resale account.

You can sign in to your account by clicking the middle icon (looks like a person) at the top right.

settings.title: How do I log in to my resale account?
settings.text: To log in to your resale account, click on the middle icon (looks like a person) at the top right. Enter your email and password, and click sign in.
Have more questions that aren't listed here? Feel free to reach out to us at customerservice@birdiebox.com and a team member will get back to you.
